title: ★4 WEEKS FREE! 1bd/1ba + W/D + AC + GYM + POOL + PARKING!★
posting_body: Call us and make this fabulous community your next home.
• Full-size washer and dryer in each apartment
• Private patio or balcony in most apartments
• Stainless steel Energy Star Frigidaire appliances include: refrigerator, dishwasher, electric range, microwave
• Espresso flat-panel cabinetry with European hardware
Deep soaking tubs and glass shower doors
• Disability access to unit, garage and pool
• Heated swimming pool and whirlpool spa
• Outstanding community room with entertainment media, catering kitchen, and billiards
• Outdoor kitchen BBQ and dining area
• High speed internet throughout common areas
• Dog wash station and bark park
• Assigned, covered parking with resident only access
